meta.dc:title: HR 991 ENR: Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To extend certain provisions of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act until September 30, 2030, and for other purposes.

main.name: HR991

content.p: To extend certain provisions of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act until September 30, 2030, and for other purposes.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Short title.
section.content: This Act may be cited as the “Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act”.

section.heading: Extension of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.
section.chapeau: Section 213 of the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act (19 U.S.C. 2703) is amended as follows:

paragraph.heading: Extension for certain knit apparel articles.—

subparagraph.content: in subclause (II)(cc), by striking “September 30, 2020” and inserting “September 30, 2030”; and
in subclause (IV)(dd), by striking “September 30, 2020” and inserting “September 30, 2030”.

paragraph.heading: Extension of limitation with respect to certain other apparel articles.—
paragraph.content: In clause (iv)(II) of such subsection, by striking “18” and inserting “28”.

paragraph.heading: Extension of transition period.—
paragraph.content: In subsection (b)(5)(D)(i), by striking “September 30, 2020” and inserting “September 30, 2030”.

subsection.heading: In general.—
subsection.chapeau: Section 13031(j)(3) of the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 (19 U.S.C. 58c(j)(3)) is amended—

paragraph.content: in subparagraph (A), by striking “September 30, 2029” and inserting “October 21, 2029”; and
in subparagraph (B)(i), by striking “September 30, 2029” and inserting “October 21, 2029”.

subsection.heading: Rate for merchandise processing fees.—
subsection.content: Section 503 of the United States–Korea Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act (Public Law 112–41; 19 U.S.C. 3805 note) is amended by striking “September 30, 2029” and inserting “October 21, 2029”.

section.heading: Determination of budgetary effects.
section.content: The budgetary effects of this Act, for the purpose of complying with the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010, shall be determined by reference to the latest statement titled “Budgetary Effects of PAYGO Legislation” for this Act, submitted for printing in the Congressional Record by the Chairman of the House Budget Committee, provided that such statement has been submitted prior to the vote on passage.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
